title: LXQt 2.0 Desktop Launches in April with New Applications Menu, Qt 6 Port
description:
LXQt 2.0 desktop environment launches in April 2024 with complete Qt 6 port, new default applications menu, and improved Wayland support.

The post LXQt 2.0 Desktop Launches in April with New Applications Menu, Qt 6 Port appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: NVIDIA 550.54.14 Linux Graphics Driver Released with Many Improvements
description:
NVIDIA 550.54.14 graphics driver is now available for download with numerous Wayland and Xwayland improvements, as well as many new features.

The post NVIDIA 550.54.14 Linux Graphics Driver Released with Many Improvements appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: NetworkManager 1.46 Adds Support for 6GHz Wi-Fi and Energy-Efficient Ethernet
description:
NetworkManager 1.46 open-source network connection manager for Linux-based operating systems is now available for download with many new features and improvements. Here's what's new!

The post NetworkManager 1.46 Adds Support for 6GHz Wi-Fi and Energy-Efficient Ethernet appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
